slot.name: description
slot.value:
The detach_inactive_subscriber_da parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature DoIS for Dual Access. The feature is valid for SGSN-MMEs for GSM and WCDMA access types. If this feature is active, the state of the DoIS features for GSM and for WCDMA (detach_inactive_subscriber and detach_inactive_subscriber_wcdma) is irrelevant.
The timer that is used to control the DoIS feature is transferred between the GSM and WCDMA domains when the MS performs an Intra-SGSN ISC. Upon an Inter-SGSN ISC, to external SGSN-MMEs, the timer is not transferred.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_conversion_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN Conversion.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The data_compression_v42bis parameter is one of two feature parameters for the licensed feature Compression on the Gb Interface. It indicates whether V.42bis data compression should be used in the SNDCP layer on the Gb interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The dual_connectivity_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Dual Connectivity Support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_resolution_extension parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN Resolution Functional Extension.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The srns_relocation is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SRNS Relocation.

slot.name: description
slot.value: "The gtpc_network_load_control parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature GTP-C Network Load Control."

slot.name: description
slot.value: The national_roaming_restriction parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Roaming Restrictions based on IMSI number series.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mocn_gsm parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Multi-Operator Core Network for GSM.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The msc_pool_sgs parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SGSN-MME Support for MSC in Pool for SGs interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The presence_reporting_area_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Presence Reporting Area (PRA) Support.
#Note: The presence _reporting_area_support is mutually exclusive with mobility_based_policy_lte, mobility_based_policy_wcdma, and cell_change_reporting.Note#

slot.name: description
slot.value: The csfb_to_1xrtt parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature CS Fallback to 1xRTT.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The dual_access_lw parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Dual Access for WCDMA and LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The access_restriction parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Access Restriction.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The conversational_qos_class parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Conversational QoS.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The closed_subscriber_group parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Closed Subscriber Group. This feature includes CSG access control, CSG subscription handling and Paging Optimization.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_oi_replacement parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN-OI Replacement.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The automated_acceptance_tests parameter controls support for the external Automated Acceptance Tests (AAT) tool.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The 3gdt parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature 3G Direct Tunnel.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The equivalent_plmns parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Selective Equivalent PLMN.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The adc parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Automatic Device Configuration.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mdt is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Minimization of Drive Tests (MDT). For more information about this feature, see Minimization of Drive Tests.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The triple_access_lwg parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Triple Access for GSM, WCDMA, and LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The mobility_based_policy_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Mobility-Based Policy for LTE.
#Note: The mobility_based_policy_lte and cell_change_reporting parameters are mutually exclusive.Note#

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_local_breakout_control parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN Local Breakout Control.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The nw_init_sec_pdpctxt parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Network Requested Secondary PDP Context.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The anr_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature ANR Support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gw_blacklisting parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Gateway Blacklisting in the S4-SGSN and MME.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The pci_compression_rfc1144 parameter is one of two feature parameters for the licensed feature Compression on the Gb Interface. It indicates whether RFC1144 PCI compression should be used in the SNDCP layer on the Gb interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mocn_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Multi-Operator Core Network for LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The Lawful Intercept HI2 and XML-based X1 feature is a market-specific variant of Lawful Intercept. For more information about LI, contact the local Ericsson support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The paging_suppression_for_fwa parameter is the feature parameter for licensed feature Paging Suppression for Fixed Wireless Access. Note: This feature parameter can be activated only when the feature parameter lte_adaptive_paging is activated.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The monitoring_enhancements parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Monitoring Enhancements (MONTE). This feature allows for MME events to be made available to the Service Capability Exposure Function (SCEF) node.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mobility_based_policy_gsm parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Mobility-Based Policy for GSM.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The pfc_flow_control parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Packet Flow Control per PFC.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The aace_support is the feature parameter for licensed feature Access Aware Core Edge Support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gtp_user_location parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature GTP User Location.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The highest_qos_rnc parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature QoS Based on RNC.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The blacklisting_ggsn parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Blacklisting of GGSN. This feature is not available for new customers.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The support_henb is the feature parameter for the licensed feature MME Support of HeNB.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The lawful_interception_var2 parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Lawful Intercept, Exp 1.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The geo_redundant_pool parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Geographically Redundant Pool.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mmtel parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature IMS-Based Telephony - MMTel.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The lte_adaptive_paging parameter is the feature parameter for licensed feature Adaptive Paging for LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The dual_access_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Dual Access for GSM and WCDMA.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The nr_access_control parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature NR Access Control.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The edrx_gsm parameter is a feature parameter for the licensed feature Extended DRX (eDRX) for GSM access. The SGSN-MME supports extended DRX functionality, used by devices, for instance M2M and IoT devices, which require longer battery life than conventional UEs.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gb_over_ip parameter is feature parameter for the licensed feature Gb over IP.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The subscription_restriction is a feature parameter used to enable or disable the Operator Determined Barring (ODB) feature, included in the licensed Subscription Based Restrictions feature for the SGSN-MME.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The combined_procedures_gs_if parameter is the feature parameter of the licensed feature Combined Procedures, Gs Interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The msc_pool_sv parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SGSN-MME Support for MSC in Pool for Sv interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The nr_gw_selection parameter is used to enable or disable the feature GW Selection for NR Usage.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The roaming_restriction_based_on_imei_tac parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Roaming Restrictions based on IMEI-TAC or IMEI-TAC SV.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The sms_over_sgd parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SMS over SGd.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The donas_rohc parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature DoNAS with Robust Header Compression (RoHC). Note: Available only for Narrowband Internet of Things (NB IoT).

slot.name: description
slot.value: The misconfig_mt_id is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Misconfigured MT Identification. The MT is identified by the logging of cause code 33 in the session event log.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The detach_inactive_subscriber_wcdma parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature DoIS for WCDMA. The feature is valid for SGSN-MMEs for WCDMA access type. The feature does not cover synchronization of the timer that is used to control the DoIS feature between the GSM and WCDMA domains when the MS performs an Intra-SGSN ISC.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The data_over_nas parameter is a feature parameter for the optional licensed feature Data over NAS.
#Note: Available only for Narrowband Internet of Things (NB IoT).Note#

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ue_signalling_control parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature UE Signaling Control.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The psm_gsm parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature UE Power Saving for GSM access. The SGSN-MME supports Power Saving Mode (PSM) enabled devices, for instance M2M and IoT devices, which require longer battery life than conventional UEs.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The public_warning_system parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Public Warning System (PWS) for LTE access. This PWS feature is also applicable for ETWS and CMAS services.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mobility_based_policy_wcdma parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Mobility-Based Policy for WCDMA.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The s_cdr_cause_code_ext is the feature parameter for the licensed feature S-CDR Cause Code Extension. If activated, extended diagnostics are included in the S-CDR. If a PDP context is deactivated due to an error detected in the RANAP or BSSGP communication, the RANAP or BSSGP cause code is provided as extended diagnostics in the S-CDR.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The authentication_stationary_subscriber parameter is the feature name of the licensed feature Authentication of Stationary Subscriber.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The integrated_traffic_capture parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Integrated Traffic Capture (ITC).
Integrated Traffic Capture Gb (ITC Gb) captures Gb traffic to and from an SGSN, including traffic from external Gb interfaces.
Integrated Traffic Capture GTP-U (ITC GTP-U) captures GTP-U traffic to and from an SGSN, including traffic from external Gn and Iu interfaces.
ITC captures the PDUs on the NS layer (ITC Gb) or the GTP-U layer (ITC GTP-U) and stores them in circular logs on the DPs, in the RAM memory. The logs are transferred and stored on the NCB upon request. ITC is managed by using CLI commands.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The iot_m2m_low_complexity_ue_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Low Complexity UE support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The decor_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Dedicated Core Network (DECOR) for LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The srvcc is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Single Radio Voice Call Continuity.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The sgsn_pool parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SGSN Pool.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The wifi_ue_throughput_mobility parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature UE Throughput Based Mobility from/to Wi-Fi.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The edrx_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Extended DRX (eDRX) for LTE access. MME supports extended DRX functionality, used by devices, for instance M2M and IoT devices, which require longer battery life than conventional UEs.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The rim_transfer is the feature parameter for the licensed feature RAN Information Management (RIM), using the rim transfer procedures among GSM, WCDMA, and LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The loadbased_ho parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Load Based Handover.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ran_cause_codes_in_scdr parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature RAN Cause Codes in CDR. If activated, extended diagnostics information (maximum of three BSSGP or RANAP cause codes if available) is included in the recordExtensions field of an S-CDR when the record is closed for each activated PDP context.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The edge_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature EDGE Support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The multiple_plmn_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Multiple PLMN Support.

slot.value: The location_services parameter is the feature name for the licensed feature Location Services.

slot.value: The connection_suspend_and_resume parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Connection Suspend and Resume.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The detach_inactive_subscriber parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature DoIS for GSM. The feature is valid for SGSN-MMEs for GSM access type.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ss7_over_ip parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SS7 over IP.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The psm_lte parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature UE Power Saving for LTE access. MME supports Power Saving Mode (PSM) enabled devices, for instance M2M and IoT devices, which require longer battery life than conventional UEs.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The cell_change_reporting parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Cell Change Reporting for MME.
#Note: The mobility_based_policy_lte and cell_change_reporting parameters are mutually exclusive.Note#

slot.value: The ps_ho parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature PS Handover / IRAT PS Handover.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gw_failure_restoration_gsm parameter is used to enable or disable the Gateway Restoration Procedures feature for GSM.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The selective_service_request parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Selective Service Request Handling.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ec_gsm_iot_support parameter is a feature parameter for the optional licensed feature Extended Coverage (EC)-GSM IoT Support.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The highest_qos_imsi parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature QoS Based on IMSI Series.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_conversion_wg parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN Conversion.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The streaming_qos_class is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Streaming QoS.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The monte_location_awareness parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Monitoring Enhancements (MONTE) Location awareness. This feature allows for MONTE to also support the configuration and reporting of Location Reporting events.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gtpprime parameter is the feature parameter for licensed feature Near Real-Time Provision of CDRs.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gw_failure_restoration_wcdma parameter is used to enable or disable the Gateway Restoration Procedures feature for WCDMA.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The msc_pool_gs parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SGSN-MME Support for MSC in Pool for Gs interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ipsec_support parameter is the feature parameter of the licensed feature IPsec for Secure Network Traffic.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The sds_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature M2M/IoT: Direct Short Data Service.
#Note: This parameter is restricted and not for general use.Note#

slot.name: description
slot.value: The embms_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature LTE Broadcast.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The add parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature ADD. This feature is valid for WCDMA Systems only.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The csfb_to_wg parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature CS fallback to WCDMA or GSM. To activate this feature it is required that the licensed feature SMS over SGs is activated.

slot.name: description
slot.value: This licensed feature parameter controls the support for Non-IP data over NAS using the T6a interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The regional_subscription is a feature parameter used to enable or disable the Regional Subscription feature, included in the licensed Subscription Based Restrictions feature for the SGSN-MME.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mme_pool parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature MME Pool.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The loc_based_ip_allocation_wcdma parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Location Based IP Address Allocation for WCDMA.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gsm_adaptive_paging parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Adaptive Paging for GSM.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The apn_redirection parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature APN Redirection.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The mbms_broadcast parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Broadcast Service for SGSN (MBMS).

slot.name: description
slot.value: The sms_over_sgs parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature SMS over SGs.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The gw_failure_restoration_lte parameter is used to enable or disable the Gateway Restoration Procedures feature for LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ebm parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Event Based Monitoring (EBM).

slot.name: description
slot.value: The nr_usage_data_reporting parameter is used to enable or disable the feature NR Usage Data Reporting.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The camel_phase3 parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Real-Time Charging Control Using CAMEL.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The ec_lte_iot_support parameter is a feature parameter for the optional licensed feature Coverage Extension Support, LTE.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The imei_check parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature IMEI check.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The lawful_interception parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Lawful Intercept.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The s3_s4_architecture_support parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature S3/S4 Architecture Support.
#Note: When the S3/S4 Architecture Support feature is set from on to off, Ericsson recommends to perform large restart to immediately clean up PDN connections using the S4 interface. Hence, the UE can quickly get data services by connecting to the GGSN.Note#

slot.name: description
slot.value: This licensed feature parameter controls the support for Non-IP data over NAS using the SGi interface.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
This is the name of the licensing parameter that specifies if it is network support for non 3GPP compliant UEs.
The parameter does not distinguish between GSM and WCDMA.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The attach_iot_limit parameter is a license parameter (in kSAU) that specifies the maximum number of simultaneously attached IoT users. Soft limit is always applied to this capacity. When the soft limit is reached, an alarm is generated and IoT devices that attach after the license is exceeded are counted towards SAU capacity license. Soft limit accepts UE Attach or TAU Requests even when the total number of simultaneously attached IoT users exceeds the purchased capacity limit, until node resource limits are reached or possibly hard license limits on SAU are reached.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The qos_hsdpa_mbr parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature HSDPA Support. The values 8, 16, 32, 48 and 84 indicate that the feature is enabled and that the MBR is 8, 16, 32, 48 or 84 Mbps, respectively. The value 2 indicates that the feature is disabled and that MBR is 2 Mbps.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The context_limit parameter is a licensing parameter (in kIP) that specifies the maximum number of IP Sessions. An IP Session is a Primary PDP Context for GSM or WCDMA, or a Default Bearer for LTE. The number of IP Sessions is the sum of the number of primary PDP Contexts and the number of Default Bearers.
When hard limit is applied for IP Session capacity and the number of IP Sessions reaches the licensed capacity limit, an alarm is generated and Activation Reject message is sent to the MS with cause code 26 - Insufficient resources.
When the SGSN Pool license or the MME Pool license exists, soft limit is applied for IP Session capacity instead. Soft limit implies that an alarm is generated and further IP Session activations are still accepted when the number of IP Sessions exceeds the licensed capacity limit up to the system defined hard limit.

slot.name: description
slot.value:
The attach_lte_limit parameter is a license parameter (in kSAU) that specifies the maximum number of simultaneously attached LTE users. When hard limit is applied to the LTE SAU capacity, and the total number of simultaneously attached LTE users reaches the purchased capacity limit, an alarm is generated, and an Attach or TAU Reject message is sent to the UE with cause code 22 - Congestion.
When an SGSN or MME Pool license exists, soft limit is applied to the LTE SAU capacity. Soft limit accepts UE Attach or TAU Requests even when the total number of simultaneously attached LTE users exceeds the purchased capacity limit, until the system defined hard limit is reached.

slot.name: description
description
slot.value:
The attach_limit parameter is a license parameter (in kSAU) that specifies the maximum number of SAU. When hard limit is applied for SAU capacity and the number of SAU reaches the licensed capacity limit, an alarm is generated and an Attach/RAU/TAU Reject message is sent to the MS or UE with cause code 22 - Congestion.
When the SGSN or MME Pool license exists, soft limit is applied for SAU capacity. Soft limit implies that further MS or UE Attach/RAU/TAU Requests are still accepted when the number of SAU exceeds the licensed capacity limit up to the system defined hard limit.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The enhanced_uplink_mbr parameter is the feature parameter for the licensed feature Enhanced Uplink Support. The value 4,8 and 16 indicate that the feature is enabled and that the maximum MBR is 4, 8 or 16 Mbps, respectively. The value 2 indicates that the feature is disabled and that the MBR is 2 Mbps.

slot.name: description
slot.value: The sms_limit parameter is a licensing parameter (in SMS/s) that specifies the SMS capacity license limit. This capacity limit is a soft limit, that is the license can be exceeded without traffic impact. All extra use of capacity is logged by the SGSN-MME.
